pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, March 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

Private meetings

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Greek Independence Day Parade.        

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.
  • Parade begins on the corner of rue Jean-Talon and rue Hutchison.
